content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, let us focus solely on the rental price discussion for now. In regards to this particular property, I believe the fair market value justifies a price of 1200 Euro per month. If you find that acceptable, I agree to the price of 1200 Euro! However, if you wish to continue negotiating for a lower price, please state your proposal. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
